docs.title: Welcome to JokerPlus Documentation

docs.text: This is your home page. You can start editing this file to add your content.

docs.title: Encryption
docs.text: Below are examples on how to do encryptions

docs.title: SHA-256
docs.text:
public static String SHA256(final String strText) {
    String strResult = null;
    if (strText != null && strText.length() > 0) {
        try {
            MessageDigest messageDigest = MessageDigest.getInstance("SHA-256");
            messageDigest.update(strText.getBytes("UTF-8"));
            byte byteBuffer[] = messageDigest.digest();
            StringBuffer strHexString = new StringBuffer();
            for (int i = 0; i < byteBuffer.length; i++) {
                String hex = Integer.toHexString(0xff & byteBuffer[i]);
                if (hex.length() == 1) {
                    strHexString.append('0');
                }
                strHexString.append(hex);
            }
            strResult = strHexString.toString();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | UnsupportedEncodingException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }
    return strResult;
}

docs.title: AES
docs.text:
public static String AES_Encrypt(String plainText, String key)
        throws UnsupportedEncodingException,
        InvalidKeyException,
        NoSuchAlgorithmException,
        NoSuchPaddingException,
        InvalidAlgorithmParameterException,
        IllegalBlockSizeException,
        BadPaddingException {
    byte[] plainTextbytes = plainText.getBytes("UTF-8");
    byte[] keyBytes = getKeyBytes(key);
    return Base64.encodeToString(encrypt(plainTextbytes, keyBytes, keyBytes), Base64.NO_WRAP);
}


private static byte[] getKeyBytes(String key)
        throws UnsupportedEncodingException {
    byte[] keyBytes = new byte[16];
    byte[] parameterKeyBytes = key.getBytes("UTF-8");
    System.arraycopy(parameterKeyBytes, 0, keyBytes, 0, Math.min(parameterKeyBytes.length, keyBytes.length));
    return keyBytes;
}

docs.title: Generate Encrypted string for http request body parameters
docs.text:
String sha256_salt = "qfYJpO87gm7MY7D1";
String aes_secret_key = "uNeQvp5Q76YMfQdx";
JSONObject obj = new JSONObject();
obj.put("Username","user001");
obj.put("Password","123456");
obj.put("Hash", SHA256("user001" + "123456" + sha256_salt)); 
String bodyParams = AES_Encrypt(String.valueOf(obj), aes_secret_key);
System.out.println(bodyParams);

docs.title: Lottery (4D) API
docs.text: Documentation for lottery and 4D betting endpoints.

docs.title: Get Latest Draw
docs.text:
GET /api/lottery/4d/latest

Description: Get the latest 4D lottery draw results.

Response:

{
  "status": "success",
  "draw_date": "2025-11-24",
  "draw_number": "1234",
  "results": {
    "first_prize": "1234",
    "second_prize": "5678",
    "third_prize": "9012"
  }
}

docs.title: Place Bet
docs.text:
POST /api/lottery/4d/bet

Description: Place a 4D lottery bet.

Request Body:

{
  "numbers": ["1234", "5678"],
  "bet_type": "big",
  "amount": 10.00,
  "draw_date": "2025-11-25"
}

Response:

{
  "status": "success",
  "bet_id": "bet_123456",
  "total_amount": 20.00,
  "message": "Bet placed successfully"
}

docs.title: Get Bet History
docs.text:
GET /api/lottery/4d/history

Description: Get user's 4D betting history.

Query Parameters:

Parameter Type Description limit integer Number of records to return offset integer Pagination offset

Response:

{
  "status": "success",
  "bets": [
    {
      "bet_id": "bet_123456",
      "numbers": ["1234"],
      "amount": 10.00,
      "draw_date": "2025-11-25",
      "status": "pending"
    }
  ],
  "total": 10
}

docs.title: Check Winning
docs.text:
POST /api/lottery/4d/check-winning

Description: Check if a bet is a winning bet.

Request Body:

{
  "bet_id": "bet_123456"
}

Response:

{
  "status": "success",
  "is_winner": true,
  "winning_amount": 5000.00,
  "prize_category": "first"
}

docs.title: Member API
docs.text: Documentation for Member API endpoints.

docs.title: Get Member Profile
docs.text:
GET /api/member/profile

Description: Retrieve member profile information.

Response:

{
  "status": "success",
  "data": {
    "username": "user001",
    "email": "user@example.com",
    "created_at": "2025-01-01T00:00:00Z"
  }
}

docs.title: Update Member Profile
docs.text:
PUT /api/member/profile

Description: Update member profile information.

Request Body:

{
  "email": "newemail@example.com",
  "phone": "+1234567890"
}

Response:

{
  "status": "success",
  "message": "Profile updated successfully"
}

docs.title: Register Member
docs.text:
POST /api/member/register

Description: Register a new member.

Request Body:

{
  "username": "newuser",
  "password": "securepassword",
  "email": "user@example.com"
}

Response:

{
  "status": "success",
  "user_id": "usr_123456"
}

docs.title: Soccer API
docs.text: Documentation for Soccer API endpoints.

docs.title: Get Soccer Matches
docs.text:
GET /api/soccer/matches

Description: Retrieve a list of soccer matches.

Response:

{
  "status": "success",
  "data": []
}

docs.title: Get Match Details
docs.text:
GET /api/soccer/match/{id}

Description: Retrieve details for a specific match.

Parameters:

Parameter Type Description id string Match ID

Response:

{
  "status": "success",
  "data": {}
}

docs.title: Wallet API
docs.text: Documentation for Wallet API endpoints.

docs.title: Get Balance
docs.text:
GET /api/wallet/balance

Description: Retrieve wallet balance.

Response:

{
  "status": "success",
  "balance": 0.00
}

docs.title: Deposit
docs.text:
POST /api/wallet/deposit

Description: Deposit funds into wallet.

Request Body:

{
  "amount": 100.00,
  "currency": "USD"
}

Response:

{
  "status": "success",
  "transaction_id": "txn_123456"
}

docs.title: Withdraw
docs.text:
POST /api/wallet/withdraw

Description: Withdraw funds from wallet.

Request Body:

{
  "amount": 50.00,
  "currency": "USD"
}

Response:

{
  "status": "success",
  "transaction_id": "txn_789012"
}
